page.title: 18Domesday Dilhorne
page.content:
The children of Dilhorne and the members of the village have had great fun in providing information for this Domesday Project, more than those who were forced to take part some 1000 years earlier. The our entry read:-
Dilhorne (1 virgate) was held by Godwin and two others, all free men. It is now held under Robert by Walter. There is land for four ploughs. In demense is half plough. The 5 villeins and 5 bordars have three and half plough. There is one acre of meadow and woodland one league long and half league wide.It is valued at 20 shillings.
